DOC.brief_summary: To determine hypofractionated IG-VMAT ( 70 Gy 28 fraction 5.6 week ) result disease-free survival ( DFS ) bad DFS follow conventionally fractionate IG-VMAT ( 80Gy 40 fraction 8 week ) patient treat localized prostate cancer . Analysis local progression , disease-specific survival ( DFS ) , freedom biochemical recurrence ( FFBR ) , overall survival ( OS ) two group . Observe incidence GI GU toxicity .
DOC.criteria: Age 5079 Histologically confirm prostate adenocarcinoma Clinical stage T13N0M0 accord AJCC 6th edition Gleason score must > 5 KPS > 70 No radical surgery cryosurgery prostate cancer Prior concurrent invasive malignancy ( except nonmelanomatous skin cancer ) lymphomatous/hematogenous malignancy unless continually disease free minimum 5 year . ( For example , carcinoma situ bladder oral cavity permissible ) Evidence distant metastasis Previous radical surgery ( prostatectomy ) cryosurgery prostate cancer Previous pelvic irradiation , prostate brachytherapy , bilateral orchiectomy Previous concurrent cytotoxic chemotherapy prostate cancer
